about_the_game:
Add to your wishlist so you don't miss a release!

We've made a calculator roguelike!

Yes, it's not a joke. A boring device has turned into an interesting strategy, where each calculator you collect sets its own style of play. Can you count all the numbers and prove who's the king of calculations here?


Your goal is to pass the required number of levels in one run, where you need to use the buttons on the calculator to get a certain number. Don't think it will be that easy, you'll be met with tricks and difficulties that will make you rack your brain over the strategy.

Game Features:

  • Choose one of several calculators to play the game. Each calculator has its own feature and set of buttons. Spend money in the store to increase the size of your calculator so it can accommodate even more buttons.
  • Buy some of the numerous buttons that exist in the game. Each button has a special action. Some buttons can literally turn the course of the game around. Buttons can perform various operations on numbers and other buttons. Earn money by getting the required number in as few moves as possible in each round.
  • Each button has a limited number of uses. Cleverly combine buttons to progress further.
  • Advance through elevations to unlock new buttons, calculators, and modes. There are advanced modes in the game that will make it even more challenging and interesting.

name: Calculate It

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible graphics card, integrated graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible graphics card, integrated graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
